# 爬虫之路

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/pachong-zhi-lu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/pachong-zhi-lu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install pachong-zhi-lu
pachong-zhi-lu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g pachong-zhi-lu
pachong-zhi-lu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
